6 month extension for PHV 

If Pco runs out between 23rd March to June 30th its a 6 month extension 

MOT dates are March 30th to June 30th it’s a 6 month extension.

@UberUKsupport @kaptenuk @wheely @boltapp

text: @taximanant @transportgovuk @TfLTPH We can assure we comply with all requirements set by TfL and are excited to launch in London today. For more questions, please contact our customer support team through Bolt app or email address london@bolt.eu. Thanks! :)
name: Bolt

text:
@Sam_L_Shead Hi Sam! Please update the Bolt app in your phone and try to open the app again. If this doesn't help then please contact our customer support through the app or send an email to london@bolt.eu. They will happily investigate this problem!
Let's hope this helps and happy Bolting!🚗
name: Bolt

text: @QPR52 Hi! We're sorry to hear you feel like this. Bolt has launched in London because we believe that we can offer the most comfortable and affordable way to move around town. Try out Boltapp, maybe you are going to like this! 😉 Have a nice day!
name: Bolt
